### Example 1: This command creates an export request for the specified database. (autogenerated)
```powershell
PS C:\> New-AzSqlDatabaseExport -AdministratorLogin User -AdministratorLoginPassword secure password -DatabaseName Database01 -ResourceGroupName RG01 -ServerName Server01 -StorageKey StorageKey01 -StorageKeyType StorageAccessKey -StorageUri http://account01.blob.core.contoso.net/bacpacs/database01.bacpac
```
